title: MINIMUM TEMPERATURE
fullText:
The battery system shall not be exposed to temperatures lower than the minimum temperature specified by the product's manufacturer. For those battery types categorized as fire hazard level 1 in Table 3.1 for which low battery temperature can result in a fire, the BMS shall â€”
(a) monitor the temperature of the battery or battery module; and
(b) act to shutdown the battery or battery module if the temperature falls below the minimum value as specified by the manufacturer.
